about_the_game:
Argo is a unique roguelite action strategy game in a minimalist style!

Use combos to use abilities, dodge enemy attacks and defeat the Void, Hell and Pestilence bosses.
You don't have to do it alone either, because you can play the entire game in online co-op mode!

- Unlock different abilities during the game and explore new combinations again and again.
- Play with a total of three different characters, each with their own stats and special abilities.
- Survive together with a friend via the online co-op mode.
- Find runes in the game that grant you permanent upgrades.
- Discover crafting recipes to create unique equipment for the next run.
- Fill the bestiary and learn the most effective ways to avoid enemies' abilities.]
